channel.title: Minecraft 1.3
channel.description:
Can't play the server? Don't understand why? Read below.
In the past it's been presumed that everybody understands the situation, but that simply isn't the case. When Minecraft updates, here at Moparcraft we need to wait for a few things. First of all we need to wait for Bukkit to update (Bukkit is what we use for our plugins), on top of that we need to wait for the individual plugin authors to adjust their plugins so they work with the updated version of Bukkit.
I've received a few PMs asking me when all this will be done and I'm sorry to say that I just don't know. Minecraft 1.3 has been quite a large update, we have lowered our plugin dependency to avoid any unnecessary waits but please be patient there is nothing we can do to speed up this process.
In the mean time, you can downgrade your client to play the 1.2.5 version of Moparcraft. Check out this sticky:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,524930.0.html
As always we appreciate your patience.

item.title: Minecraft 1.3
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:452409”][quote author=Tom link=topic=555288.msg4065858#msg4065858 date=1343877509]

[quote]Improved Multiplayer
Made entities less likely to glitch through blocks.
Added automagical downloading of standard sized texture packs when joining servers.
Made server commands more descriptive.
Added reason parameter to /ban.
Added /seed command to show the map seed.[/quote]

That’s nice but, you won’t be able to use it
[/quote]
I just want to know the slime chunks :(:(:([/quote]
All we need is for someone to generate a rainbow table of servers!

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft 1.3
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

KroniKz_:

bukkit updated it

Please bear in mind there are different builds, you have development/beta/recommended. Right now there isn’t a recommended build, they’re called dev builds for a reason they’re very unstable and contain lots of issues.

We also have to wait for plugins to update

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Can’t play the server? Don’t understand why? Read below.

In the past it’s been presumed that everybody understands the situation, but that simply isn’t the case. When Minecraft updates, here at Moparcraft we need to wait for a few things. First of all we need to wait for Bukkit to update (Bukkit is what we use for our plugins), on top of that we need to wait for the individual plugin authors to adjust their plugins so they work with the updated version of Bukkit.
